snippet.title: Amorphous+ 63 Awards in a single run
snippet.description: I already got all of the awards, so I decided to reset my data and see how many awards I could get in a single bounty run. My record is a self-satisfying 63 awards. Yes, I did have the difficulty ramp on slow -_- but I'd say that 63 awards in a single run is still pretty impressive. If anyone tried doing the same thing and managed to get as many or more awards, please give me the link to your video or post it as a video response straight away!
